title: Trump says he will pardon ex-Honduras president convicted of drug trafficking
description: Juan Orlando Hernández was sentenced in the US last year to 45 years behind bars for conspiring to import cocaine into the country.
content:
US President Donald Trump has said that he will pardon the ex-president of Honduras, Juan Orlando Hernández, who was convicted of drug trafficking charges in a US court last year.

title: A visual guide to how the Hong Kong fire spread
description: What we know about how a deadly fire engulfed several high-rise apartment buildings in Hong Kong.
content:
Hong Kong is still waiting to learn the full scale of the tragedy that unfolded on Wednesday when a fire engulfed several apartment buildings.
